content.question: The cadences in measures 11–12 and 19–20 are best described as

choices.label: Measures 11–12 Measures 19–20 A major: deceptive A major: authentic
Measures 11–12 Measures 19–20 f#-minor: deceptive f# minor: authentic
Measures 11–12 Measures 19–20 f# minor: authentic A major: authentic
Measures 11–12 Measures 19–20 f# minor: authentic A major: half

content.answer: Measures 11–12 Measures 19–20 f# minor: authentic A major: authentic

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

topic.text: 4.3: Harmonic Progression, Functional Harmony, and Cadences

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in notated music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
